profileAlternative.name: Franklin Levy
profileAlternative.headline: Programming professional with focus on Heath Care/HR/Business systems & SQL Server/Visual Studio programming environment
profileAlternative.summary:
Extensive Health Care Claim Processing system experience, Health Care Data Analytics experience and HR systems experience. Wrote in-house medical claims processing system and internal medical claim audit system. Contact person for other companies and government agencies. Securely transferred confidential data to/from outside organizations including Health Care TPAs, private corporations, New York State and the IRS.

Programming professional with extensive experience in every phase of system design and development.

Creates, maintains and administers SQL Server databases using SQL Server Management Console (SSMC). Creates and maintains systems using Visual Studio, VB.net and VB6. Develops reports using Crystal Reports and SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS). Trains users in system use and ad-hoc report development. Specializes in early detection of design problems and efficient solutions to design problems. Strong communicator reaching across all levels of the user community to develop systems. Systematically organized, detailed oriented and likes to learn.

Always open to exploring new endeavors.

positions.title: Visual Studio and SQL Server Development
positions.description: Extensive Health Care Claim Processing system experience, Health Care Data Analytics experience and HR system experience. Creates, maintains and administers SQL Server databases using SQL Server Management Console (SSMC). Creates and maintains systems using Visual Studio, VB.net and VB6. Develops reports using Crystal Reports and SQL Server Reporting/Integration Services (SSRS, SSIS). Trains users in system use and ad-hoc report development. Specializes in early detection of design problems and efficient solutions to design problems. Strong communicator reaching across all levels of the user community to develop systems.

positions.title: Business Systems Analyst
positions.companyName: J. Kings Food Service Professionals, Inc.
positions.description: Supported administrative staff reporting requirements by providing data in various formats.

positions.title: Dayton T. Brown, Inc
positions.description:
Extensive Health Care Claim Processing system experience and Health Care Data Analytics experience. Wrote in-house medical claims processing system, internal medical claim audit system and multiple TPA Medical systems to scrub and transfer data to/from various TPAs.

Supported HR by programming annual Affirmative Action Plans, reviews, applicant tracking, HR policies.

Designed and created multiple SQL Server databases, tables, views, stored procedures, triggers, constraints, keys and indexes based on company requirements, user specs and interviews.

Maintained and Secured SQL Server databases using SQL Server Management Console (SSMC).

Installed new instances of SQL Server, upgraded existing instances of SQL Server.

Created /Maintained large number of systems in VB.net in Visual Studio 2002/05/10/12, VB6, T-SQL, Crystal Reports, SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) and SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS), Word, Excel.

Integral team member of in-house project resulting in core Accounting, Purchasing, HR, Job Costing, Government Contracts and Divisional Requirements systems and reporting.

Created /Maintained/Distributed/Exported large number of reports and files.

Securely transferred encrypted, confidential data to/from outside organizations including Health Care TPAs, private corporations, New York State and the IRS. Follows HIPPA guidelines.

Trained users in system use and ad-hoc report generation.
…
see more

positions.title:
Title
Sr. Programmer/Analyst & System Manager/DBA
positions.description:
Programmed in-house Medical Claims Processing, Accounting, HR and Government Contract Reporting systems in Speedware 4GL on the HP3000 mini-computer platform.

Responsible for all system management on the HP3000. Installed all system updates and all third party program updates. Maintained entire user environment. Responsible for all Image/3000 Database maintenance. Spent over two years successfully migrating all production and test databases into Y2K compliance.

Trained users in system use and ad-hoc report generation.

skills.title: Visual Studio VB.net and SSRS programming
Contact person for other companies and government agencies

given.text:
It is with great pleasure that I write this recommendation for Franklin Levy. As a Benefits Administrator, I have worked with Frank directly on several healthcare related projects. With the many Government changes that had taken place, the company was in the process of transitioning to a TPA with all our Health and Dental administration. Frank played a MAJOR role in setting up our internal system to integrate with our TPA. Frank took on the task of setting up all the fields, and organizing all the file feeds that DTB had to transmit on a daily or monthly basis. He was also vital in providing all necessary information for the TPA to complete all reports and remain compliant with all state and federal laws. The integrity and privacy of the information that needed to be transmitted was always first and foremost the concern. Frank's attention to detail, his continued knowledge in researching all security issues; coupled with his ability to express any concerns; is really what aided in the success of this project. I worked with Frank daily. I considerr Frank a subject matter expert in any IT position. He is a great asset to all his business partners and would bring value add to his next career opportunity.
…
See more

I worked with Frank for many years at Dayton T. Brown, Inc. on several different HR related projects. Many times Frank created entire systems (and databases) to automate Human Resources requirement. He would interview the necessary parties involved, review all the documentation, design and code the resulting system. Frank would also revise the systems as required. Frank went above and beyond to understand the laws that we are required to adhere to. Recently, Frank was responsible for creating an annual comprehensive spreadsheet containing the company’s Affirmative Action data to be submitted to our vendor in order to help us prepare our Affirmative Action Plan which is required by the federal government for federal contractors. I understand this involved merging several different sources of information and it was done to flawlessly. Frank always ended up saving our HR Department a lot of manual work and a lot of time. I always found Frank easy to work with and he always understood each step of the law as I explained it to him for his job to done thorough and to perfection. Frank would always take things a step further and ask, "what if...",which was a tremendous help when dealing with such detailed work. Frank is extremely detailed and has an astonishing amount of knowledge to assist in HRIS projects.
…
See more

I am very pleased to write this letter of recommendation on behalf of Frank Levy. I worked with Frank for 17 years at Dayton T. Brown, Inc. and I believe him to be a skilled, thoughtful, and thoroughly professional Information Technology expert. As Benefits Administrator, I worked with Frank as he developed a Benefits Administration System. He always showed strong analytical and problem solving skills. I have always been impressed by his outstanding diligence and his high level of technical expertise. He is very hard-working and understands exactly what a project is all about from the outset, and how to get it done quickly and effectively. Frank is accountable and responsible, with a superior work ethic and a high degree of integrity. I recommend Frank Levy very highly for any position in the IT field that involves complexity and creativity. He is a hardworking person who will do his very best to do an outstanding job for whomever he works. Sincerely, Marietta Sciulara
…
See more

items: Completion of Customer Service and Quality, High Performance Work Organization, Management Development Certificate Program, Total Quality Management and Customer First training courses.
Pluralsight: SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) - 3 courses
Pluralsight: SQL Server Reporting Service (SSRS) - 3 courses
Pluralsight: SQL Service Analysis Services (SSAS) - 1 course
Pluralsight: VB.net and Visual Studio - 3 courses
